name: Slime Rancher | Story Mode
description:
Join Jake Pink, Goldie, and Beatrix as they go on an adventure of a lifetime as they defeat numerous villains and slimes to save Jake's pet slime, Tabby, and maybe something even bigger. The world.

But! Before you go on your adventure, there's one thing you NEED to remember. Whatever you do, say, or think affects whatever happens throughout your quest.

You can also play this game on other websites. Such as Scratch, and Gamejolt

✦ INCLUDES ✦

  • Complete Season 1 Pass!
  • Fully Remastered Episodes!
  • Updates and possibly new features!
